% eng-rubrics PDF styling
% Included via pandoc --include-in-header

% Colors
\usepackage{xcolor}
\definecolor{engblue}{HTML}{1F4E79}
\definecolor{headerblue}{HTML}{2E75B6}
\definecolor{lightgray}{HTML}{F2F2F2}
\definecolor{tableborder}{HTML}{9CC2E5}

% Section heading styling
\usepackage{titlesec}

% H1 - Main title (blue, large, with rule below)
\titleformat{\section}
  {\color{engblue}\normalfont\Large\bfseries}
  {}{0em}{}
  [\color{engblue}\titlerule]

% H2 - Competency areas (blue, medium)
\titleformat{\subsection}
  {\color{engblue}\normalfont\large\bfseries}
  {}{0em}{}

% H3 - Sub-sections (blue, smaller)
\titleformat{\subsubsection}
  {\color{headerblue}\normalfont\normalsize\bfseries}
  {}{0em}{}

% Reduce spacing around headings
\titlespacing*{\section}{0pt}{12pt}{6pt}
\titlespacing*{\subsection}{0pt}{10pt}{4pt}
\titlespacing*{\subsubsection}{0pt}{8pt}{4pt}

% Table styling
\usepackage{longtable}
\usepackage{booktabs}
\usepackage{array}
\usepackage{colortbl}

% Make tables full width
\setlength{\tabcolsep}{6pt}

% Style for table header rows
\let\oldtoprule\toprule
\renewcommand{\toprule}{\rowcolor{headerblue}\oldtoprule}

% Paragraph spacing (tighter)
\setlength{\parskip}{6pt}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}

% List styling (tighter)
\usepackage{enumitem}
\setlist{nosep, leftmargin=1.5em}
\setlist[itemize]{label=\textbullet}

% Font (use Arial-like sans-serif)
\usepackage{fontspec}
\setmainfont{DejaVu Sans}

% Ensure horizontal rules appear
\usepackage{mdframed}

% Link colors
\usepackage{hyperref}
\hypersetup{
  colorlinks=true,
  linkcolor=engblue,
  urlcolor=engblue
}
